text:
How long are your actions taking? There are limits, I believe 20 seconds. 

Also, check the Private App log and see if you're hitting a rate limit. 

I always separate out my CCAs to make it easier to maintain.
Just create an active company list and in the filters, use associated contacts that are enrolled in that workflow. No need for an API

Just cast the input value to a number.

In JS

```let controlledNumber = new Number( event.inputFiels['myNumberProperty'] );```
